body.h2: 21-22 October 2013 · Edinburgh International Conference Centre · Edinburgh, Scotland, UK
body.p: For the fourth GStreamer Conference we're back in Europe. This year we will be co-hosting with the Embedded Linux Conference Europe, LinuxCon Europe, the Automotive Linux Summit and the Linux Kernel Summit. The event will be held at the Edinburgh International Conference Centre (EICC) in Edinburgh, Scotland.
For more details, see the GStreamer Conference 2013 page.

Anyone interested in open source multimedia is encouraged to join us at the GStreamer Conference. Whether you are a hobbyist or a student interested in the field of multimedia, or working for a company using or looking to use GStreamer in their products, this is the perfect event for you to network at and to learn more about the latest technological breakthroughs in and around GStreamer. The talks will target both developers and managers alike.
If you have any questions about the GStreamer Conference or are considering becoming a sponsor, please contact Christian Schaller or Tim-Philipp Müller.
